Posted By: Gelzo (12/30/2010 9:00:21 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Yes, true, but not many decks are built around that sort of thing. And if your deck DOES have those cards, yeah, don't use it. But that's the same sort of thing as, say, not using big fatties in a weenie deck. Or similar.   
  
Also, sunburst counts the color of mana used to pay for something, it doesn't care about the basic lands you have out. This would work just as well in a sunburst deck as a mountain.  
  
In the vast majority of decks, it's not worse than a mountain at all.
posts.html:
Yes, true, but not many decks are built around that sort of thing. And if your deck DOES have those cards, yeah, don't use it. But that's the same sort of thing as, say, not using big fatties in a weenie deck. Or similar.

Also, sunburst counts the color of mana used to pay for something, it doesn't care about the basic lands you have out. This would work just as well in a sunburst deck as a mountain.

In the vast majority of decks, it's not worse than a mountain at all.

Posted By: Gelzo (12/30/2010 9:00:21 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Mountains are better than this card.   
  
The benefit of Hammerheim's special ability pales in comparison to being able to obtain an extra mana from having [Gauntlet of Power](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gauntlet of Power) in play, or any sort of card that utilizes basic lands as a basis for determining power (i.e., cards with domain or sunburst, or [Barrel Down Sokenzan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Barrel Down Sokenzan) , [Ben-Ben, Akki Hermit](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ben-Ben, Akki Hermit ) , [Fire Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fire Dragon), [Goblin Charbelcher](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Charbelcher), [Rockslide Ambush](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rockslide Ambush), [Seismic Strike](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Seismic Strike), [Spire Barrage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spire Barrage), [Spitting Earth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spitting Earth)).
posts.html:
Mountains are better than this card.

The benefit of Hammerheim's special ability pales in comparison to being able to obtain an extra mana from having Gauntlet of Power in play, or any sort of card that utilizes basic lands as a basis for determining power (i.e., cards with domain or sunburst, or Barrel Down Sokenzan , Ben-Ben, Akki Hermit , Fire Dragon, Goblin Charbelcher, Rockslide Ambush, Seismic Strike, Spire Barrage, Spitting Earth).
